subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] QS-SAMPA Keyboard layout
msgSnippet: ... What about my proposal for mapping ligatures to accented vowels and half-letters to superfluous capitals.  I got the impression you were going to adopt
messageBody:
On 2007-12-08 Ted Larson Freeman wrote:
> All you are missing is the alternate letters 'Noon' and 'Up', which
> should be mapped to 'q' and 'V'. I realize you'll have to create two
> new glyphs to do this--we all appreciate the effort you've poured into
> this project, so please don't stay up late just to do this!
>

What about my proposal for mapping ligatures to accented
vowels and half-letters to 'superfluous' capitals. I got
the impression you were going to adopt that?


/BP 8^)>
--
Benct Philip Jonsson -- melroch atte melroch dotte se
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
No man forgets his original trade: the rights of
nations and of kings sink into questions of grammar,
if grammarians discuss them.
-Dr. Samuel Johnson (1707 - 1784)
